name: Riccardo Marchetti
subtitle: Group CEO @ Adamant Group | International Business, Commodities
about: With over 17 years of experience in the commodities and biofuels industry, I am the Group CEO of Adamant Group, a global player in sustainable and innovative biofuels solutions. I oversee the strategic direction, business development, and operational excellence of the group, which operates in Europe, Asia, and America. I have a strong background in trading, risk management, and sustainability, having worked with leading companies such as Louis Dreyfus Commodities and Wilmar Europe Trading B.V. I have successfully managed and expanded the group's portfolio of products and services, including waste & residues feedstock and biofuels. I have also spearheaded the group's efforts to achieve environmental and social responsibility, as well as compliance with international standards and regulations. I am passionate about creating value for our clients, partners, and stakeholders, while contributing to the global transition to a low-carbon economy. I have a degree in International Economics from Universit√† degli Studi di Ferrara, and I speak English, Spanish, and Italian. I am always eager to learn new skills, explore new opportunities, and collaborate with diverse and talented teams.
